About check sum
[Product sn howto]

I plan to calcuate checksum follow this function

typedef unsigned char _u8;
typedef unsigned short  _u16;
typedef unsigned long _u32;

//   param buf:        sn number char buffer which copy from mtd partition
//   param length :    N bytes of buf
//   retval:            check sum

_u16 checksum16(_u16 *buf, _u16 length)
{
        _u32 sum = 0;
        _u16 len = length >> 1;
        while(len-- > 0)
        sum += *buf++;
        if(length & 1)
        sum +=(*buf & 0x00ff);
        sum = (sum >> 16) + (sum & 0xffff);
        sum += (sum >> 16);
        len = (sum & 0xffff);
        return (~len);
}
